Xavier Beauvois https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xavier_Beauvois 0 Xavier Beauvois (French: [ɡzavje bovwa]; born 20 March 1967) is a French actor, film director and screenwriter. Xavier_Beauvois ( French : [_ɡzavje_bovwa_] ; born_20_March_1967 ) is a_French_actor , film_director_and_screenwriter .
